Google Gives Eric Schmidt "Unprecedented"$ 100 Million Equity Award Outgoing Chief Executive Officer Eric Schmidt will receive a$ 100 million equity award from Google, the company has confirmed. The award includes stock and stock options, and vests over four years, and is the largest for a sitting CEO, the Wall Street Journal$ 335 million Eric Schmidt will make by selling 534,000 shares of stock.
